metadata.synopsis: Not Critpath. A small tiefling girl (7-9 years old), very shy and nervous, is planning on stealing from the player and is surprised that they're talking to her. Though she's a gifted thief, she's not good at lying. There is also a portion of this dialogue where the player can get her to partially admit to having stolen from them.

10.speaker: Silfy
10.text: I don't have money or anything to sell. My p-partner does that.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Is he your partner or your brother?

34.speaker: Silfy
34.text: He sells the stuff and I... don't sell the stuff.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: UncertainNodeContext: Making it up

46.speaker: Player
46.text: You're just here to stand guard, then?

33.speaker: Silfy
33.text: Right. So... look out! I'm watching you!
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: PointingNodeContext: Shaky, pretending to be a guard

29.speaker: Player
29.text: So what's your side of the business?

85.speaker: Silfy
85.text: I'm the guard? So... don't steal anything! I'm watching you!

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Mol told me everything. Keep your hands to yourself.

59.speaker: Silfy
59.text: I will. Did I say sorry? Sorry.

2.speaker: Player
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The npc looks surprised but nods nervously and turns away.

67.speaker: Silfy
67.text: Mol's in charge here. Not me.

48.speaker: Silfy
48.text: Um, hi. Are you here to see my brother?

64.speaker: Silfy
64.text: Mol says we can't talk to you anymore. Um. Sorry.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I've been robbed. You're the guard - see anything suspicious?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I've been robbed. Have you seen anyone acting suspiciously?

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Do you know of any thieves around here?

30.speaker: Silfy
30.text: But, um, I'll go ask my boss for you. Right now.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Tell me the truth - or I'll feed you to a bear.

69.speaker: Silfy
69.text: Nice try. The bears are nice here. Um. I think.
69.context: NodeContext: She starts out sure of herself, then doubts herself by the time she's through speaking. What if the bears AREN'T nice?

65.speaker: Silfy
65.text: Yes! Mol said they're calm as cats! She...

88.speaker: Player
88.text: You know, you didn't deny lying to me.

83.speaker: Silfy
83.text: What? N-no! We didn't do anything! Me and Mattis and Mol, we just...

54.speaker: Player
54.text: My teeth are sharper than any bear's, little one.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Look at me. Do you really think it's the bears you have to worry about?

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The bears might be. I'm not.

21.speaker: Silfy
21.text: Y-you don't scare me. You won't do nothing with all the grown-ups around!
21.context: NodeContext: She's trying to convince herself wiht this line.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Did you know that I can smell when people are lying?

68.speaker: Silfy
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scared, caught. NodeContext: Nervous squeak.

78.speaker: Silfy
78.text: Stop... stop yelling at me! Or I'll call Mol!

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Is Mol the one who stole from me?

4.speaker: Silfy
4.text: I shouldn't have said that. I gotta go!

26.speaker: Wyll
26.text: Wow - you really showed that small defenceless child who's in charge.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Silfy sprints away.NodeContext: Sarcastic (thought that was pretty obvious, I bet)

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *Before you can say anything else, she sprints away.*

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *Before you can say anything else, she sprints away.*

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Your little friend doesn't frighten me.

24.speaker: Silfy
24.text: She should! Mol's tougher than anyone! She...

81.speaker: Silfy
81.text: Um. I wasn't supposed to say her name.

63.speaker: Silfy
63.text: Anyway, I won't say anything else. You can't make me. Even if you murder me!

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Good. Then I can toss both of you into the river.

87.speaker: Silfy
87.text: Oh. Um. We can both swim.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You can't yell without a tongue. They go well with a pinch of salt. Tasty.

91.speaker: Silfy
91.text: Y-you wouldn't do that! Not with all the grown-ups around!

89.speaker: Silfy
89.text: I don't know what you mean. At all.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Child - I'm a visitor here. I deserve better than this.

1.speaker: Silfy
1.text: It's... It's just so hard! We're on our own, and Mol said she'd help us. She...
1.context: NodeContext: The words start tumbling out. They're pent up, and she's spilling it all because she thinks she has a sympathetic ear. Then she catches herself.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I know your game - and it's sloppy. Drop the act.

71.speaker: Silfy
71.text: It wasn't my idea, it was Mol's! She...

96.speaker: Silfy
96.text: I can't talk right now. I'm supposed to be looking for, um, marks. You know.
